title: Sold - Jumbo T206 Tris SPeaker Pied 350 SGC 3

posts.post_title: Sold - Jumbo T206 Tris SPeaker Pied 350 SGC 3
posts.post_content:
Sold net delivered/insured.

Fantastic centering, registration and color. Jumbo borders with obvious corner wear. 

Also willing to trade + cash for '49 Leaf Ted WIlliams.

Thanks for looking.
Bump for price redux and trade consideration for 49 Leaf Williams. Thanks for looking.
Another trip around the horn. Thanks for looking.
July bump. $1,050 net delivered. Thanks for your consideration.
